name: Koda Web
description:
Koda is a digital web design and development agency based in Auckland, New Zealand.
We are passionate about all things web. Our knowledge and expertise allow us to deliver innovative website design and development solutions for our clients that meet their business requirements.
Whether it is a fully loaded eCommerce package, a custom development, an integrated website or a smaller brochure website, we can assist.
We specialise in the Drupal open source platform, and have been building hybrid solutions utilising ReactJS frontends powered by the Drupal CMS.
We would welcome any enquiry and are always happy to share our knowledge.
